categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic battalions

nodes.text: Execute Battalion was a clone trooper battalion within the famed 501st Legion. It was commanded by clone trooper captain CT-7567.

During the Battle of Devaron Execute Battalion, originally stationed aboard the Resolute, manned the All Terrain Tactical Enforcer designated ATAT300 and, along with two other brigades and two Jedi, boarded a CIS Munificent-class star frigate and proceeded to hunt the bounty hunter Cad Bane, wanted by the Galactic Republic for numerous crimes.
